entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
